GE07naray__u:12321.1-1: yudhiṣṭhira uvāca: gṛhastho brahmacārī vā !vānaprastho 'tha bhikṣukaḥ !

GE07naray__u:12321.27-1: śrībhagavān uvāca: avācyam etad vaktavyam !ātmaguhyaṃ sanātanam !
GE07naray__u:12321.28-1: yat tat sūkṣmam avijñeyam !avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam !
GE07naray__u:12321.29-1: sa hy antarātmā bhūtānāṃ !kṣetrajñaś ceti kathyate !
GE07naray__u:12321.30-3: āvābhyāṃ pūjyate 'sau hi !daive pitrye ca kalpite !!12321.30!
GE07naray__u:12321.31-1: nāsti tasmāt paro 'nyo hi !pitā devo 'tha vā dvijaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12321.31-2: ātmā hi nau sa vijñeyas !tatas taṃ pūjayāvahe !!12321.31!
GE07naray__u:12321.33-1: brahmā sthāṇur manur dakṣo !bhṛgur dharmas tapo damaḥ !

GE07naray__u:12328.1-1: janamejaya uvāca: astauṣīd yair imaṃ vyāsaḥ !saśiṣyo madhusūdanam !

GE07naray__u:12329.1-1: arjuna uvāca: agnīṣomau kathaṃ pūrvam !ekayonī pravartitau !
GE07naray__u:12329.1-2: eṣa me saṃśayo jātas !taṃ chindhi madhusūdana !!12329.1!

GE07naray__u:12329.3-5: naiva rātryāṃ na divase na sati nāsati na vyakte nāvyakte vyavasthite !
GE07naray__u:12329.3-6: etasyām avasthāyāṃ nārāyaṇaguṇāśrayād akṣayād ajarād anindriyād agrāhyād asaṃbhavāt satyād ahiṃsrāl lalāmād vividhapravṛttiviśeṣāt !
GE07naray__u:12329.3-7: akṣayād ajarāmarād amūrtitaḥ sarvavyāpinaḥ sarvakartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūto harir avyayaḥ !!12329.3!
GE07naray__u:12329.5-1: tasyedānīṃ tamaḥsaṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoner brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇo netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja !
GE07naray__u:12329.5-2: tato bhūtasarge pravṛtte prajākramavaśād brahmakṣatram upātiṣṭhat !
GE07naray__u:12329.5-3: yaḥ somas tad brahma yad brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.5-4: yo 'gnis tat kṣatraṃ kṣatrād brahma balavattaram !
GE07naray__u:12329.5-5: kasmād iti lokapratyakṣaguṇam etat tad yathā !
GE07naray__u:12329.5-8: bhūtasargaḥ kṛto brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyaṃ dhāryatae iti !!12329.5!
GE07naray__u:12329.7-1: na hy ete mantrād dhavanam asti !
GE07naray__u:12329.7-3: havir mantrāṇāṃ saṃpūjā vidyate devamanuṣyāṇām anena tvaṃ hoteti niyuktaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.7-4: ye ca mānuṣā hotrādhikārās te ca !
GE07naray__u:12329.7-5: brāhmaṇasya hi yājanaṃ vidhīyate na kṣatravaiśyayor dvijātyoḥ
GE07naray__u:12329.7-6: tasmād brāhmaṇā hy agnibhūtā yajñān udvahanti !
GE07naray__u:12329.7-7: yajñā devāṃs tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhāvayanti !!12329.7!
GE07naray__u:12329.8-2: agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yo vidvān brāhmaṇamukhe dānāhutiṃ juhoti !
GE07naray__u:12329.8-3: evam apy agnibhūtā brāhmaṇā vidvāṃso 'gniṃ bhāvayanti !
GE07naray__u:12329.8-4: agnir viṣṇuḥ sarvabhūtāny anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati !
GE07naray__u:12329.10-1: brāhmaṇānāṃ matir vākyaṃ !karma śraddhā tapāṃsi ca !
GE07naray__u:12329.10-2: dhārayanti mahīṃ dyāṃ ca !śaityād vāry amṛtaṃ yathā
GE07naray__u:12329.11-1: nāsti satyāt paro dharmo !nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.11-2: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti !pretya ceha ca bhūtaye !!12329.11!
GE07naray__u:12329.13-1: vedapurāṇetihāsaprāmāṇyān nārāyaṇamukhodgatāḥ sarvātmānaḥ sarvakartāraḥ sarvabhāvanāś ca brāhmaṇāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.13-2: vāksamakālaṃ hi tasya devasya varapradasya brāhmaṇāḥ prathamaṃ prādurbhūtā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca śeṣā varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.13-3: itthaṃ ca surāsuraviśiṣṭā brāhmaṇā yadā mayā brahmabhūtena purā svayam evotpāditāḥ surāsuramaharṣayo bhūtaviśeṣāḥ sthāpitā nigṛhītāś ca !!12329.13!
GE07naray__u:12329.14-1: ahalyādharṣaṇanimittaṃ hi gautamād dhariśmaśrutām indraḥ prāptaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.14-3: aśvinor grahapratiṣedhodyatavajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhito bāhuḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.14-4: kratuvadhaprāptamanyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā cātmānaṃ saṃyojya netrākṛtir anyā lalāṭe rudrasyotpāditā !!12329.14!
GE07naray__u:12329.15-1: tripuravadhārthaṃ dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasyośanasā śiraso jaṭā utkṛtya prayuktāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.15-3: tair asya bhujagaiḥ_1 pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭho nīlatām upanītaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.15-4: pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇahastabandhagrahaṇān nīlakaṇṭhatvam eva vā !!12329.15!
GE07naray__u:12329.16-1: amṛtotpādane puraścaraṇatām upagatasyāṅgiraso bṛhaspater upaspṛśato na prasādaṃ gatavatyaḥ kilāpaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.16-3: yasmān mamopaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtā na prasādam upagatās tasmād adyaprabhṛti jhaṣamakaramatsyakacchapajantusaṃkīrṇāḥ kaluṣībhavateti !
GE07naray__u:12329.17-1: viśvarūpo vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohito devānām āsīt svasrīyo 'surāṇām !
GE07naray__u:12329.17-2: sa pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asurebhyaḥ
GE07naray__u:12329.18-1: atha hiraṇyakaśipuṃ puraskṛtya_1 viśvarūpamātaraṃ svasāram asurā varam ayācanta
GE07naray__u:12329.18-2: he svasar ayaṃ te putras tvāṣṭro viśvarūpas triśirā devānāṃ purohitaḥ pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asmākam !
GE07naray__u:12329.18-4: tad enaṃ tvaṃ vārayitum arhasi tathā yathāsmān bhajed iti
GE07naray__u:12329.19-2: putra kiṃ parapakṣavardhanas tvaṃ mātulapakṣaṃ nāśayasi !
GE07naray__u:12329.19-4: sa viśvarūpo mātur vākyam anatikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt !!12329.19!
GE07naray__u:12329.20-1: hairaṇyagarbhāc ca vasiṣṭhād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpaṃ prāptavān
GE07naray__u:12329.20-2: yasmāt tvayānyo vṛto hotā tasmād asamāptayajñas tvam apūrvāt sattvajātād vadhaṃ prāpsyasīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.21-2: tasya vratabhaṅgārtham indro bahvīḥ śrīmatyo 'psaraso niyuyoja !
GE07naray__u:12329.21-3: tāś ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitam tasyābhavat tāsu cāpsaraḥsu nacirād eva sakto 'bhavat !
GE07naray__u:12329.21-4: saktaṃ cainaṃ jñātvāpsarasa ūcur gacchāmahe vayaṃ yathāgatam iti !!12329.21!
GE07naray__u:12329.22-2: kva gamiṣyatha āsyatām tāvan mayā saha śreyo bhaviṣyatīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.22-4: vayaṃ devastriyo 'psarasa indraṃ varadaṃ purā prabhaviṣṇuṃ vṛṇīmahae iti !!12329.22!
GE07naray__u:12329.23-1: atha tā viśvarūpo 'bravīd adyaiva sendrā devā na bhaviṣyantīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.23-4: ekenāsyena sarvalokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhir yajñeṣu suhutaṃ somaṃ papāv ekenāpa ekena sendrān devān !
GE07naray__u:12329.23-5: athendras taṃ vivardhamānaṃ somapānāpyāyitasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede
GE07naray__u:12329.24-1: devāś ca te sahendreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmur ūcuś ca !
GE07naray__u:12329.24-5: tad arhasi no vidhātuṃ śreyo yad anantaram iti !!12329.24!
GE07naray__u:12329.25-1: tān brahmovāca ṛṣir bhārgavas tapas tapyate dadhīcaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.25-2: sa yācyatāṃ varaṃ yathā kalevaraṃ jahyāt !
GE07naray__u:12329.26-1: devās tatrāgacchan yatra dadhīco bhagavān ṛṣis tapas tepe !
GE07naray__u:12329.26-2: sendrā devās tam abhigamyocur bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnaṃ ceti !
GE07naray__u:12329.26-3: tān dadhīca uvāca svāgataṃ bhavadbhyaḥ kiṃ kriyatām !
GE07naray__u:12329.26-5: te tam abruvañ śarīraparityāgaṃ lokahitārthaṃ bhagavān kartum arhatīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.26-501: [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: evam ukto dadhīcas tān abravīt !
GE07naray__u:12329.26-502: X sahasraṃ varṣāṇām aindraṃ padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām
GE07naray__u:12329.26-503: X tathety uktvendraḥ svasthānaṃ dattvā tapasvy- abhavat !
GE07naray__u:12329.26-505: X tāvat pūrṇe sendrā devā āgaman kālo 'yaṃ dehanyāsāyeti
GE07naray__u:12329.26-6: atha dadhīcas tathaivāvimanāḥ sukhaduḥkhasamo mahāyogī ātmānaṃ samādhāya śarīraparityāgaṃ cakāra !!12329.26!
GE07naray__u:12329.27-001: [X Kumbh..ed. ins.:: śrutir apy atra bhavati !
GE07naray__u:12329.27-002: X indro dadhīco 'sthibhiḥ kṛtam iti !12329.26872! X]
GE07naray__u:12329.27-1: tasya paramātmany avasṛte tāny asthīni dhātā saṃgṛhya vajram akarot !
GE07naray__u:12329.27-2: tena vajreṇābhedyenāpradhṛṣyeṇa brahmāsthisaṃbhūtena viṣṇupraviṣṭenendro viśvarūpaṃ jaghāna !
GE07naray__u:12329.27-301: [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. Cv:: takṣṇā yajñapaśoḥ śiras te dadāmīty uktvā !12329.27873!
GE07naray__u:12329.27-4: tasmād anantaraṃ viśvarūpagātramathanasaṃbhavaṃ tvaṣṭrotpāditam evāriṃ vṛtram indro jaghāna !!12329.27!
GE07naray__u:12329.28-1: tasyāṃ dvaidhībhūtāyāṃ brahmavadhyāyāṃ bhayād indro devarājyaṃ parityajya apsusaṃbhavāṃ śītalāṃ mānasasarogatāṃ nalinīṃ apsu !
GE07naray__u:12329.28-2: tatra caiśvaryayogād aṇumātro bhūtvā bisagranthiṃ praviveśa
GE07naray__u:12329.29-1: atha brahmavadhyābhayapranaṣṭe trailokyanāthe śacīpatau jagad anīśvaraṃ babhūva
GE07naray__u:12329.30-1: atha devā ṛṣayaś cāyuṣaḥ putraṃ nahuṣaṃ nāma devarājatve 'bhiṣiṣicuḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.30-2: nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śatair jyotiṣāṃ lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ sarvatejoharais triviṣṭapaṃ pālayāṃ babhūva !
GE07naray__u:12329.30-3: atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāś ca babhūvuḥ !!12329.30!
GE07naray__u:12329.31-2: sarvaṃ māṃ śakropabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm iti !
GE07naray__u:12329.31-3: sa evam uktvā śacīsamīpam agamad uvāca cainām !
GE07naray__u:12329.31-4: subhage 'ham indro devānāṃ bhajasva mām iti !
GE07naray__u:12329.32-3: aham indrasya rājyaratnaharo nātrādharmaḥ kaścit tvam indrabhukteti !
GE07naray__u:12329.32-6: tasyāvabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiścid evāhobhir iti !
GE07naray__u:12329.33-1: atha śacī duḥkhaśokārtā bhartṛdarśanalālasā nahuṣabhayagṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat
GE07naray__u:12329.33-2: sa ca tām abhigatāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dhyānaṃ praviśya bhartṛkāryatatparāṃ jñātvā bṛhaspatir uvāca !
GE07naray__u:12329.33-3: anenaiva vratena tapasā cānvitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutim āhvaya !
GE07naray__u:12329.34-1: sātha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutiṃ mantrair āhvayat !
GE07naray__u:12329.34-3: uvāca cainām iyam asmi tvayopahūtopasthitā kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.34-4: tāṃ mūrdhnā praṇamyovāca śacī bhagavaty arhasi me bhartāraṃ darśayituṃ tvaṃ satyā matā ceti !
GE07naray__u:12329.35-1: tām indraḥ patnīṃ kṛśāṃ glānāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintayāṃ babhūva !
GE07naray__u:12329.35-2: aho mama mahad duḥkham idam adyopagatam !
GE07naray__u:12329.35-3: naṣṭaṃ hi mām iyam anviṣyopāgamad duḥkhārteti !
GE07naray__u:12329.36-3: nahuṣas tvayā vācyo 'pūrveṇa mām ṛṣiyuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍha udvahasva !
GE07naray__u:12329.36-4: indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇy adhirūḍhāni mayā !
GE07naray__u:12329.37-1: athendrāṇim abhyāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvovāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kāla iti !
GE07naray__u:12329.37-3: sa maharṣiyuktaṃ vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacīsamīpam upāgacchat
GE07naray__u:12329.38-1: atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayonir agastyo maharṣīn vikriyamāṇāṃs tān nahuṣeṇāpaśyat !
GE07naray__u:12329.38-3: tataḥ sa nahuṣam abravīd akāryapravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm !
GE07naray__u:12329.38-4: sarpo bhava yāvad bhūmir girayaś ca tiṣṭheyus tāvad iti !
GE07naray__u:12329.38-5: sa maharṣivākyasamakālam eva tasmād yānād avāpatat
GE07naray__u:12329.39-2: tato devā ṛṣayaś ca bhagavantaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaraṇam indrārthe 'bhijagmuḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.39-3: ūcuś cainaṃ bhagavann indraṃ brahmavadhyābhibhūtaṃ trātum arhasīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.39-4: tataḥ sa varadas tān abravīd aśvamedhaṃ yajñaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śakro 'bhiyajatu
GE07naray__u:12329.40-1: tato devā ṛṣayaś cendraṃ nāpaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcur gaccha subhage indram ānayasveti !
GE07naray__u:12329.40-3: indraś ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma !
GE07naray__u:12329.40-5: tataḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaṃ medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanaṃ tam eva kṛtvā indraṃ marutpatiṃ bṛhaspatiḥ svasthānaṃ prāpayām āsa !!12329.40!
GE07naray__u:12329.41-1: tataḥ sa devarāḍ devair ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapastho niṣkalmaṣo babhūva
GE07naray__u:12329.41-201: [X D7 T G1-3.6 Cs.v ins.:: vanitāsu rajaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.41-206: X tasmād dhavir alavaṇaṃ pacyate !12329.41874! X]
GE07naray__u:12329.41-3: evaṃ indro brahmatejaḥprabhāvopabṛṃhitaḥ śatruvadhaṃ kṛtvā svasthānaṃ prāpitaḥ
GE07naray__u:12329.42-001: [X D7 T1 G1.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: nahuṣasya śāpamokṣanimittaṃ devair ṛṣibhir yācyamāno 'gastyaḥ prāha !
GE07naray__u:12329.42-003: X kathayitvā svakān praśnān !svaṃ bhīmaṃ ca vimokṣyate
GE07naray__u:12329.42-1: ākāśagaṅgāgataś ca purā bharadvājo maharṣir upāspṛśaṃs trīn kramān kramatā viṣṇunābhyāsāditaḥ
GE07naray__u:12329.42-2: sa bharadvājena sasalilena pāṇinorasi tāḍitaḥ salakṣaṇoraskaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ !!12329.42!
GE07naray__u:12329.44-1: aditir vai devānām annam apacad etad bhuktvāsurān haniṣyantīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.44-4: tatra devaiḥ pūrvam etat prāśyaṃ nānyenety aditir bhikṣāṃ nādāt !
GE07naray__u:12329.44-5: atha bhikṣāpratyākhyānaruṣitena budhena brahmabhūtena vivasvato dvitīye janmany aṇḍasaṃjñitasyāṇḍaṃ māritam adityāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.44-501: [X K6.7 V1 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2-5.7-9 Cs Kumbh..ed. ins. after brahmabhūtena:: aditiḥ śaptā aditer udare bhaviṣyati vyathā !12329.44876!
GE07naray__u:12329.45-2: tābhyaḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa prādād daśa dharmāya daśa manave saptaviṃśatim indave !
GE07naray__u:12329.45-3: tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatrākhyāṃ gatāsu somo rohiṇyām abhyadhikāṃ prītim akarot !
GE07naray__u:12329.45-4: tatas tāḥ śeṣāḥ patnya īrṣyāvatyaḥ pituḥ samīpaṃ somo rohiṇīm adhikaṃ bhajatīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.46-3: dakṣaś cainam abravīn na samaṃ vartasae iti !
GE07naray__u:12329.46-91: tatra cāvabhāsitas tīrthe yadā somas tadāprabhṛti tīrthaṃ tat prabhāsam iti nāmnā khyātaṃ babhūva (!)
GE07naray__u:12329.46-94: meghasadṛśaṃ varṇam agamat tad asya śaśalakṣma vimalam abhavat !!12329.46!
GE07naray__u:12329.47-1: sthūlaśirā maharṣir meroḥ prāguttare digbhāge tapas tepe !
GE07naray__u:12329.47-2: tasya tapas tapyamānasya sarvagandhavahaḥ śucir vāyur vivāyamānaḥ śarīram aspṛśat !
GE07naray__u:12329.47-3: sa tapasā tāpitaśarīraḥ kṛśo vāyunopavījyamāno hṛdayaparitoṣam agamat !
GE07naray__u:12329.47-4: tatra tasyānilavyajanakṛtaparitoṣasya sadyo vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaśobhāṃ na darśitavanta iti sa etāñ śaśāpa na sarvakālaṃ puṣpavanto bhaviṣyatheti !!12329.47!
GE07naray__u:12329.48-1: nārāyaṇo lokahitārthaṃ vaḍavāmukho nāma maharṣiḥ purābhavat !
GE07naray__u:12329.48-2: tasya merau tapas tapyataḥ samudra āhūto nāgataḥ !
GE07naray__u:12329.48-6: etac ca te toyaṃ vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitena pīyamānaṃ madhuraṃ bhaviṣyati !
GE07naray__u:12329.48-7: tad etad adyāpi vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitenānuvartinā toyaṃ sāmudraṃ pīyate !!12329.48!
GE07naray__u:12329.49-001: [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: punar umā dakṣakopād dhimavato girer duhitā babhūva !12329.48877! X]
GE07naray__u:12329.49-1: himavato girer duhitaram umāṃ rudraś cakame !
GE07naray__u:12329.49-2: bhṛgur api ca maharṣir himavantam āgamyābravīt kanyām umāṃ me dehīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.49-3: tam abravīd dhimavān abhilaṣito varo rudra iti !
GE07naray__u:12329.49-4: tam abravīd bhṛgur yasmāt tvayāhaṃ kanyāvaraṇakṛtabhāvaḥ pratyākhyātas tasmān na ratnānāṃ bhavān bhājanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti !
GE07naray__u:12329.50-2: kṣatram api śāśvatīm avyayāṃ pṛthivīṃ patnīm abhigamya bubhuje !
GE07naray__u:12330.1-1: śrībhagavān uvāca: sūryācandramasau śaśvat !keśair me aṃśusaṃjñitaiḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.3-2: varṇaś ca me hariśreṣṭhas !tasmād dharir ahaṃ smṛtaḥ
GE07naray__u:12330.4-1: dhāma sāro hi lokānām !ṛtaṃ caiva vicāritam !
GE07naray__u:12330.5-1: naṣṭāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ pūrvam !avindaṃ vai guhāgatām !
GE07naray__u:12330.6-2: tenāviṣṭaṃ hi yat kiṃcic !chipiviṣṭaṃ hi tat smṛtam !!12330.6!
GE07naray__u:12330.7-2: śipiviṣṭa iti hy asmād !guhyanāmadharo hy aham !!12330.7!
GE07naray__u:12330.8-1: stutvā māṃ śipiviṣṭeti !yāsko ṛṣir udāradhī udāradhīḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.9-1: na hi jāto na jāye 'haṃ !na janiṣye kadācana !
GE07naray__u:12330.10-2: ṛtā brahmasutā sā me !satyā devī sarasvatī !!12330.10!
GE07naray__u:12330.12-1: sattvān na cyutapūrvo 'haṃ !sattvaṃ vai viddhi matkṛtam !
GE07naray__u:12330.14-2: kṛṣṇo varṇaś ca me yasmāt !tasmāt kṛṣṇo 'ham arjuna
GE07naray__u:12330.15-1: mayā saṃśleṣitā bhūmir !adbhir vyoma ca vāyunā !
GE07naray__u:12330.15-2: vāyuś ca tejasā sārdhaṃ !vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ tato mama !!12330.15!
GE07naray__u:12330.18-2: te māṃ gāyanti prāgvaṃśe !adhoakṣaja iti sthitiḥ !!12330.18!
GE07naray__u:12330.19-001: [X D7 T G2.3.6 ins.:: adho na kṣīyate yasmād !vadanty anye 'py adhoakṣajam !12330.18879! X]
GE07naray__u:12330.19-2: nānyo hy adhoakṣajo loke !ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum !!12330.19!
GE07naray__u:12330.21-1: trayo hi dhātavaḥ khyātāḥ !karmajā iti ca smṛtāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.21-2: pittaṃ śleṣmā ca vāyuś ca !eṣa saṃghāta ucyate !!12330.21!
GE07naray__u:12330.22-1: etaiś ca dhāryate jantur !etaiḥ kṣīṇaiś ca kṣīyate !
GE07naray__u:12330.23-1: vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmaḥ !khyāto lokeṣu bhārata !
GE07naray__u:12330.24-1: kapir varāhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca !dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyate !
GE07naray__u:12330.25-001: [X K7 D4.9 ins.:: nādimantaṃ na cāntaṃ ca !kadācid vidyate surāḥ !12330.24880!
GE07naray__u:12330.25-1: na cādiṃ na madhyaṃ tathā naiva cāntaṃ !
GE07naray__u:12330.25-3: anādyo hy amadhyas tathā cāpy anantaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.26-2: na ca pāpāni gṛhṇāmi !tato 'haṃ vai śuciśravāḥ !!12330.26!
GE07naray__u:12330.27-2: imām uddhṛtavān bhūmim !ekaśṛṅgas tato hy aham !!12330.27!
GE07naray__u:12330.31-2: yogaiḥ saṃpūjyate nityaṃ !sa evāhaṃ vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ !!12330.31!
GE07naray__u:12330.32-2: sahasraśākhaṃ yat sāma !ye vai vedavido janāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.35-1: śākhābhedāś ca ye kecid !yāś ca śākhāsu gītayaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.38-2: kramaṃ praṇīya śikṣāṃ ca !praṇayitvā sa gālavaḥ !!12330.38!
GE07naray__u:12330.49-1: kṣiptaś ca sahasā rudre !khaṇḍanaṃ prāptavāṃs tadā !
GE07naray__u:12330.50-001: [X Kumbh..ed. ins.:: rudrasya bhāgaṃ pradadur !bhāgam uccheṣaṇaṃ punaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.50-002: X śrutir apy atra bhavati !vedair uktas tathā punaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.50-003: X uccheṣaṇabhāgo vai rudras tasyoccheṣaṇena hotavyam iti sarve gamyarūpeṇa tadā !12330.49881! X]
GE07naray__u:12330.50-1: arjuna uvāca: asmin yuddhe tu vārṣṇeya !trailokyamathane tadā
GE07naray__u:12330.50-2: jayaṃ kaḥ prāptavāṃs tatra !śaṃsaitan me janārdana !!12330.50!
GE07naray__u:12330.54-2: agāc choṣaṃ samudraś ca !himavāṃś ca vyaśīryata !!12330.54!
GE07naray__u:12330.56-2: uvāca vacanaṃ rudraṃ !lokānām astu vai śivam !
GE07naray__u:12330.60-1: mayā ca sārdhaṃ varadaṃ !vibudhaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.61-1: brahmaṇā tv evam uktas tu !rudraḥ krodhāgnim utsṛjan !
GE07naray__u:12330.63-2: uvāca devam īśānam !īśaḥ sa jagato hariḥ !!12330.63!
GE07naray__u:12330.64-1: yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti !yas tvām anu sa mām anu !
GE07naray__u:12330.64-2: nāvayor antaraṃ kiṃcin !mā te bhūd buddhir anyathā
GE07naray__u:12330.68-3: mayā tvaṃ rakṣito yuddhe !mahāntaṃ prāptavāñ jayam !!12330.68!
GE07naray__u:12330.69-1: yas tu te so 'grato yāti !yuddhe saṃpratyupasthite !
GE07naray__u:12330.70-1: kālaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ !krodhajeti mayā tava !
GE07naray__u:12330.70-2: nihatāṃs tena vai pūrvaṃ !hatavān asi vai ripūn !!12330.70!
GE07naray__u:12330.71-201: [X K1.2.4.6.7 V1 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2-5.8.9 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: yaḥ sa te kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ !krodhajeti punaḥ punaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12330.71-202: X tasya prabhāvam evāgryaṃ !yac chrutaṃ te dhanaṃjaya
GE07naray__u:12331.1-1: janamejaya uvāca: brahman sumahad ākhyānaṃ !bhavatā parikīrtitam !
GE07naray__u:12331.1-2: yac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve !vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ !!12331.1!
GE07naray__u:12331.2-001: [X K1.2.4.6 V1 after 6, Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.7.8 & G1-3.6 editions ins. AppI.32 X]
GE07naray__u:12331.6-2: ṛṣayaś ca sagandharvā !yac ca kiṃcic carācaram !
GE07naray__u:12331.6-3: na tato 'sti paraṃ manye !pāvanaṃ divi ceha ca !!12331.6!
GE07naray__u:12331.9-1: na citraṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra !yad āryo me dhanaṃjayaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12331.10-1: na cāsya kiṃcid aprāpyaṃ !manye lokeṣv api triṣu !
GE07naray__u:12331.11-1: dhanyāś ca sarvae evāsan !brahmaṃs te mama pūrvakāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12331.13-201: [X T2 G1.2 ins.:: dṛṣṭavān yo hariṃ devaṃ !nārāyaṇam ajaṃ vibhum !12331.13883!
GE07naray__u:12331.15-1: badarīm āśramaṃ yat tu !nāradaḥ prādravat punaḥ !

GE07naray__u:12336.62-2: na kurvanti kathaṃ viprā !anye nānāvrate sthitāḥ !!12336.62!

GE07naray__u:12336.68-2: sāttvikas tu sa vijñeyo !bhaven mokṣe ca niścitaḥ !!12336.68!
GE07naray__u:12336.74-1: janamejaya uvāca: kathaṃ vaikāriko gacchet !puruṣaḥ puruṣottamam !!12336.74!
GE07naray__u:12336.75-001: [X K1.2.4.6 V1 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2-5.7-9 editions ins.:: vada sarvaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ !pravṛttiṃ ca yathākramam !12336.74901! X]
GE07naray__u:12336.80-2: sa evāyaṃ mayā tubhyam !ākhyātaḥ prasṛto guroḥ !!12336.80!
GE07naray__u:12336.82-1: kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānāṃ !bhāvano mohanas tathā !
GE07naray__u:12337.1-1: janamejaya uvāca: sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ pañcarātraṃ !vedāraṇyakam eva ca !
GE07naray__u:12337.2-2: prabrūhi vai mayā pṛṣṭaḥ !pravṛttiṃ ca yathākramam !!12337.2!
GE07naray__u:12337.3-1: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca: jajñe bahujñaṃ param atyudāraṃ !
GE07naray__u:12337.6-1: janamejaya uvāca: tvayaiva kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ !saṃbhavo dvijasattama !
GE07naray__u:12337.11-2: ahaṃ caturthaḥ śiṣyo vai !śuko vyāsātmajas tathā !!12337.11!
GE07naray__u:12337.15-1: sa pūrvam uktvā vedārthān !bhāratārthāṃś ca tattvavit !
GE07naray__u:12337.18-2: tataḥ sa prādur abhavad !athainaṃ vākyam abravīt !!12337.18!
GE07naray__u:12337.21-1: kā śaktir mama deveśa !prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ namo 'stu te !
GE07naray__u:12337.24-2: uvāca vacanaṃ devo !buddhiṃ vai prabhur avyayaḥ !!12337.24!
GE07naray__u:12337.25-2: tatas tam īśvarādiṣṭā !buddhiḥ kṣipraṃ viveśa sā !!12337.25!
GE07naray__u:12337.26-2: bhūyaś cainaṃ vacaḥ prāha !sṛjemā vividhāḥ prajāḥ !!12337.26!
GE07naray__u:12337.27-001: [X K1.2.4.6.7 V1 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn2.ṇ4 Ds D2-5.7-9 T1 G1.3.6 Cs Kumbh..ed. ins.:: bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa !yathājñāṃ śirasā hareḥ !12337.26902!
GE07naray__u:12337.27-002: [X D7 T1 G3.6 cont.:: tathākaroc ca dharmātmā !brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ !12337.26903! X]
GE07naray__u:12337.28-2: athāsya buddhir abhavat !punar anyā tadā kila !!12337.28!
GE07naray__u:12337.33-2: mayā hy eṣā hi dhriyate !pātālasthena bhoginā !!12337.33!
GE07naray__u:12337.39-1: tam uvāca nataṃ mūrdhnā !devānām ādir avyayaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12337.41-1: śrībhagavān uvāca: manvantareṣu putra tvam !evaṃ lokapravartakaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12337.42-1: punas tiṣye ca saṃprāpte !kuravo nāma bhāratāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12337.48-6: tasmād ṛṣes tvaṃ bhavitā ca putraḥ !!12337.48!
GE07naray__u:12337.52-0: [X K6 V1 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.8 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: bhaviṣyati mahāsattva !khyātiś cāpy atulā tava !!12337.51904! X]
GE07naray__u:12337.52-3: tvam eva bhavitā vatsa !matprasādān na saṃśayaḥ !!12337.52!
GE07naray__u:12337.53-001: [X K6 V1 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.8 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: yat kiṃcid vidyate loke !sarvaṃ tan madviceṣṭitam !
GE07naray__u:12337.53-002: X anyo hy anyaṃ cintayati !svacchandaṃ vidadhāmy aham !12337.52905! X]
GE07naray__u:12337.53-1: vyāsa uvāca: evaṃ sārasvatam ṛṣim !apāntaratamaṃ tadā !
GE07naray__u:12337.55-1: tad etat kathitaṃ janma !mayā pūrvakam ātmanaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12337.57-1: etad vaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ !yan māṃ pṛcchatha putrakāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12337.58-1: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca: eṣa te kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ !saṃbhavo 'smadguror nṛpa_2 !
GE07naray__u:12337.64-2: na cainam evaṃ jānāti !tamobhūtā viśāṃ pate !!12337.64!
GE07naray__u:12337.68-1: sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dve !
GE07naray__u:12338.1-1: janamejaya uvāca: bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmann !utāho eka eva tu !
GE07naray__u:12338.1-2: ko hy atra puruṣaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ !ko vā yonir ihocyate !!12338.1!
GE07naray__u:12338.15-2: nityam ugratapās tvaṃ hi !tataḥ pṛcchāmi te punaḥ !!12338.15!
GE07naray__u:12338.22-1: rudra uvāca: bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmaṃs !tvayā sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā !
GE07naray__u:12338.22-2: sṛjyante cāpare brahman !sa caikaḥ puruṣo virāṭ !!12338.22!
GE07naray__u:12338.23-1: ko hy asau cintyate brahmaṃs !tvayā vai puruṣottamaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12338.23-2: etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi !mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me !!12338.23!
GE07naray__u:12338.24-1: brahmovāca: bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ putra !ye tvayā samudāhṛtāḥ !
GE07naray__u:12338.24-2: evam etad atikrāntaṃ !draṣṭavyaṃ naivam ity api !
GE07naray__u:12339.1-1: brahmovāca: śṛṇu putra yathā hy eṣa !puruṣaḥ śāśvato 'vyayaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12339.2-1: na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭuṃ !mayānyair vāpi sattama !
GE07naray__u:12339.2-2: saguṇo nirguṇo viśvo !jñānadṛśyo hy asau smṛtaḥ !!12339.2!
GE07naray__u:12339.3-2: vasann api śarīreṣu !na sa lipyati karmabhiḥ !!12339.3!
GE07naray__u:12339.6-2: tāni vetti sa yogātmā !tataḥ kṣetrajña ucyate !!12339.6!
GE07naray__u:12339.7-1: nāgatir na gatis tasya !jñeyā bhūtena kenacit !
GE07naray__u:12339.8-1: cintayāmi gatiṃ cāsya !na gatiṃ vedmi cottamām !
GE07naray__u:12339.9-1: tasyaikatvaṃ mahattvaṃ hi !sa caikaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12339.12-2: vicared yo yatir yattaḥ !sa gacchet puruṣaṃ prabhum
GE07naray__u:12339.14-1: tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi !sa nityaṃ nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12339.14-2: sa hi nārāyaṇo jñeyaḥ !sarvātmā puruṣo hi saḥ !
GE07naray__u:12339.15-1: karmātmā tv aparo yo 'sau !mokṣabandhaiḥ sa yujyate !
GE07naray__u:12339.18-1: yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ !
GE07naray__u:12339.18-3: yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu !
GE07naray__u:12339.19-4: tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-001: [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 12326.93; Kumbh..ed. after 12326.92:: tataḥ kaliyugasyādau !bhutvā rājataruṃ śritaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-005: X śūdrāḥ śrāddheṣu bhojyante !mayi buddhatvam āgate !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-009: X na śṛṇvanti pituḥ putrā !na snuṣā naiva mātaraḥ !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-01: X na mitraṃ na kalatraṃ vā !vartate hy adharottaram !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-012: X bhaviṣyati kalau nagno hy !aśuddho varṇasaṃkaraḥ !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-016: X tasmād ete na saṃbhāṣyā !na spraṣṭavyā itārthibhiḥ !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-02: X sahāyā brāhmaṇāḥ sarve !tair ahaṃ sahitaḥ punaḥ !
GE07naray__u:12999.31-023: X ahaṃ paścād bhaviṣyāmi !yajñeṣu nirataḥ sadā !12999.31!
GE07naray__u:12999.32-001: [X K1.2.4.6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.7.8 T G1-3.6 Kumbh. ed. ins after 12331.1, V1 after 6:: sarvāśramābhigamanaṃ !sarvatīrthāvagāhanam !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-002: X na tathā phaladaṃ saute !nārāyaṇakathā yathā
GE07naray__u:12999.32-003: X pāvitāṅgāḥ sma saṃvrṭtāḥ !śrutvemām āditaḥ kathām !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-006: X devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ kṛtsnair !anyaiś caiva maharṣibhiḥ !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-007: X dṛṣṭavān nārado yatra !devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-008: X nūnam etad dhy anumataṃ !tasya devasya sūtaja !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-01: X yat prādravat punar bhūyo !nārado devasattamau !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-011: X naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ !kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-012: X sūta uvāca: tasmin yajñe vartamāne !rājñaḥ pārikṣitasya vai !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-016: X janamejaya uvāca: śvetadvīpān nivṛttena !nāradena surarṣiṇā !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-017: X dhyāyatā bhagavadvākyaṃ !ceṣṭitaṃ kim ataḥ param !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-018: X badary-āśramam āgamya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī !
GE07naray__u:12999.32-019: X kiyantaṃ kālam avasat !kāṃ kathām pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ
